list.abs: study on the coix lachryma - jobi lactic acid drink ., 薏米乳酸饮料的研究.

Brucea Javanica oil and coix lachryma-jobi oil were grease materials extracted from the seeds of Brucea Javanica and coix lachryma-jobi , in which the unsaturated acids are effective components .鸦胆子油和薏苡仁油分别由鸦胆子和薏苡仁的成熟果实中提取而得的油脂类物质，其中所含的不饱和脂肪酸为主要的有效成分。

苡米：苡米，又名薏苡（Coix lachryma-jobi L.）。薏仁米、沟子米、六谷子、菩提珠。
